contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}}This is a '''list of [[island]]s of [[Poland]]'''. {{TOC right}} == [[Baltic Sea]] == * [[Uznam]] ([[Usedom]]) * [[Wolin]] == Islands of [[Oder Lagoon]] == * [[Karsibór]] * [[Wielki Krzek]] * Wiszowa Kępa * Trzcinice * Gęsia Kępa * [[Warnie Kępy]] * Koński Smug * Wydrza Kępa * Chełminek * Chrzaszczewo == Islands of [[Gdańsk Bay]] == * [[Islands of Gdańsk]] ** [[Port Island (Gdańsk)|Port Island]] Area 25.7 km² [[population]] 22,167 people. ** [[Sobieszewo Island]] Area: 34.3 km² population: 3,570 people. ** [[Ostrów Island]] ** [[Granary Island]] * [[Żuławy Island]] == See also == * [[List of islands in the Baltic Sea]] * [[List of islands]] == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.westteam.uznam.net.pl/iwipl.htm polskich wysp by Dave 191] {{Poland topics}} {{Europe topic|List of islands of}} [[Category:Lists of islands by country|Poland, List of islands of]] [[Category:Islands of Poland|*]] [[Category:Lists of landforms of Poland|Islands]]
